benefits.title: Prevents Dandruff Recurrence
benefits.description: Piroctone Olamine targets and inhibits dandruff-causing fungi, and Pentavitin® helps heal and strengthen the scalp.

benefits.title: Exfoliates The Scalp
benefits.description: Salicylic Acid exfoliates the scalp and effectively reduces the flaky skin and prevents it from growing back.

benefits.title: Instant Relief From Itchy Scalp
benefits.description: Pentavitin® keeps the scalp nourished, reducing dryness and helping restore the skin's protective barrier.

benefits.title: Enhances Scalp Health
benefits.description: Neem deeply nourishes the scalp, helping maintain its natural balance while soothing irritation and dryness.

reviews.title: Great Product Ever!
reviews.text: This neem shampoo cleared my dandruff and stopped the itch in just a few washes!

reviews.title: Unlike others, it doesn't dry out my hair
reviews.text: Unlike others, it doesn't dry out my hair—keeps my scalp balanced and soothed.

reviews.title: Worth the wait!
reviews.text: Took a couple of weeks, but my dandruff is improving. Worth the wait!
